divs: Sighting DetailsObserved 3 light on and off every 10 sec or so rotating or banking around each other. when banking we could see flames or sparks coming out (think sparkler) the rear. Saw one plane bank around then view became obstructed behind houses. Viewed from a mile or so away for about 10-15 min. Our subdivision is in the path of the IAH airport and all planes in line for landings moved out of the area for another 20 min before I saw another plane. 3 witnesses and Iphone video.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: 3 lights circling slowly around each other the flames of sparks (large) when turning
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Spring
There were no other sightings in Spring on or around November 8th 2013
